item.title: GraphQL Hello World Server
item.description: GraphQL Hello World Server The main purpose of this server-client Node.js project is to help other people understand how GraphQL exposes the data from the Server and the Client fetches it. I have tried to make it as simple as possible- if you want to dive into the code of the project you can find it here. Now, straight to the point: GraphQL is a query language for APIs developed and open-sourced by Facebook to speed up the request process.
